verbs.description: some advertisers [V: are] moving half of their search budget from google to amazon advertisers are spending three to five times as much on amazon ads this year as they did a year ago and some are moving 50 percent of their old google search budgets to amazon search instead according to agency sources but google ad revenues are still growing for now as youtube and other services pick up the slack amazon google amazon marketplace amazoncom
